titleStmt.title: Catalogue of Tamil Manuscripts (BnF) by Velanguani Arokium

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits.

summary.p: A partial catalogue of the Tamil manuscripts of the then Bibliothèque Royale (today the BnF) by Velanguani Arokium (Tamil Vēḷāṅkaṇṇi Ārōkkiyam) from Pondicherry, handwritten in 1845.

The codex contains:
A title page (by Reinaud?) (U1a).
The catalogue proper, by Velanguani Arokium (U1b): first are described 27 manuscrits (numbered from 1 to 27; the no. 7 is missing), then the 38 Ducler manuscripts (numbered from 1 to 38).
Additions to the catalogue by an unidentified hand (U1c): description of 9 manuscripts (numbered from 39 to 47, in continuation of the Ducler manuscript numbering, without being in fact, as attested by the provenance mentioned, Ducler manuscripts).
Description based on the digital images available on Gallica.

encodingDesc.p: French standardised in the transcription. General ― Unmarked length of ō and ē supplied. Unmarked puḷḷi supplied. Conjectural reading (text unclear) between parentheses. Supplied reading (text lost) between square brackets. Alternative readings separated by slash. In transliteration ― Unmarked elided overshort u supplied as an apostrophe. Uppercase for initial vowels. Symbols between curly brackets. Abbreviations ― c = column; f = folio; lf = library foliation; lm = left margin; r = recto; rm = right margin; u / U followed by a number = unit (codicological and/or textual); v = verso.
